str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To live together with. From sun and zao; to continue to live in common with, i.e. Co-survive.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
